item.title: Chavans decision to skip PMs function unfortunate BJP
item.description: The BJP in Maharashtra on Thursday termed as unfortunate chief minister Prithviraj Chavans decision to boycott Prime Minister Narendra Modis programme in Nagpur and said Congress should introspect why people are unhappy with the state leadership
item.itunes:subtitle: The BJP in Maharashtra on Thursday termed as unfortunate chief minister Prithviraj Chavans decision to boycott Prime Minister Narendra Modis programme in Nagpur and said Congress should introspect why people are unhappy with the state leadership
item.itunes:summary: The BJP in Maharashtra on Thursday termed as unfortunate chief minister Prithviraj Chavans decision to boycott Prime Minister Narendra Modis programme in Nagpur and said Congress should introspect why people are unhappy with the state leadership

item.title: BJP supporters give Hemant Soren the Hooda treatment at Modi rally
item.description: Jharkhand chief minister Hemant Sorennbsp was booed by the crowd while sharing the stage with Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Ranchi on Thursday just two daysnbsp afternbsp his Haryana counterpart Bhupinder Singh Hooda faced a similar humiliation Should PM Modi ask BJP supporters to behave
item.itunes:subtitle: Jharkhand chief minister Hemant Sorennbsp was booed by the crowd while sharing the stage with Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Ranchi on Thursday just two daysnbsp afternbsp his Haryana counterpart Bhupinder Singh Hooda faced a similar humiliation Should P
item.itunes:summary: Jharkhand chief minister Hemant Sorennbsp was booed by the crowd while sharing the stage with Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Ranchi on Thursday just two daysnbsp afternbsp his Haryana counterpart Bhupinder Singh Hooda faced a similar humiliation Should PM Modi ask BJP supporters to behave

item.title: Jharkhand can play a vital role in Indias progress Modi
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi dedicated to India on Thursday the 765 kv RanchiDharmjaygarhSipat Transmission Line Powergrid connecting the Eastern and Western parts of the country He also inaugurated the transmission link online at Prabhat Tara
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi dedicated to India on Thursday the 765 kv RanchiDharmjaygarhSipat Transmission Line Powergrid connecting the Eastern and Western parts of the country He also inaugurated the transmission link online at Prabhat Tara

item.title: TMC leader calls for burning real human effigies
item.description: Even as the controversy surrounding Trinamool Congress MP Tapas Pauls rape and kill remarks is yet to subside a party legislator has now talked about burning real human effigies

item.title: Moderate intensity earthquake rocks parts of HP
item.description: A moderate intensity earthquake rocked Kangra Mandi Shimla and Chamba districts of Himachal Pradesh on Thursday afternoon measuring 52 on the richter scale It took place at 141 pm and lasted for a few seconds
item.itunes:subtitle: A moderate intensity earthquake rocked Kangra Mandi Shimla and Chamba districts of Himachal Pradesh on Thursday afternoon measuring 52 on the richter scale It took place at 141 pm and lasted for a few seconds
item.itunes:summary: A moderate intensity earthquake rocked Kangra Mandi Shimla and Chamba districts of Himachal Pradesh on Thursday afternoon measuring 52 on the richter scale It took place at 141 pm and lasted for a few seconds

item.title: Goa CM says sorry for saying Negro in assembly
item.description: Goa chief minister Manohar Parrikar on Thursday apologised for using the word Negro in one of the answers tabled on the floor of the House here after the alleged racist slur evoked strong reactions from the members
item.itunes:subtitle: Goa chief minister Manohar Parrikar on Thursday apologised for using the word Negro in one of the answers tabled on the floor of the House here after the alleged racist slur evoked strong reactions from the members
item.itunes:summary: Goa chief minister Manohar Parrikar on Thursday apologised for using the word Negro in one of the answers tabled on the floor of the House here after the alleged racist slur evoked strong reactions from the members

item.title: SC notice to centre over governors dismissal
item.description: The Supreme Court on Thursday issued notice to the central government on a petition filed by Uttarakhand Governor Aziz Qureshi challenging the procedure followed in securing his resignation in the wake of BJP coming to power

item.title: Ram Sene banned in Goa at behest of mafia Muthalik
item.description: Controversial right wing outfit Sri Ram Senes chief Pramod Muthalik has alleged that the Goa government banned his organisation at the behest of drug lords and pub mafia
item.itunes:subtitle: Controversial right wing outfit Sri Ram Senes chief Pramod Muthalik has alleged that the Goa government banned his organisation at the behest of drug lords and pub mafia
item.itunes:summary: Controversial right wing outfit Sri Ram Senes chief Pramod Muthalik has alleged that the Goa government banned his organisation at the behest of drug lords and pub mafia

item.title: Vardhan says Chaturvedi not eligible for CVOs post
item.description: Union health minister Harsh Vardhan on Thursday said Sanjiv Chaturvedi was removed as the chief vigilance officer CVO at the All India Institute of Medical Sciences AIIMS because he was not eligible for the post

item.title: Matchmaking portal for IIT IIM graduates
item.description: Are you a graduate of IIT IIM and are looking for a life partner with the same educational qualification A new website a miniature version of mega marriage websites can help you

item.title: Assam Army in troubled Golaghat district
item.description: Army Thursday conducted flag march in Assams troubled Golaghat district near the border with Nagaland even as a youth was injured when security forces fired rubber bullets at protestors who defied a curfew

item.title: Judges appointment system SC to hear pleas
item.description: The Supreme Court will hear on Monday a batch of petitions challenging the 121st constitutional amendment by which collegium system for appointment of judges in higher judiciary was scrapped and a new mechanism under National Judicial Appointment Commission was proposed to be put in place
item.itunes:subtitle: The Supreme Court will hear on Monday a batch of petitions challenging the 121st constitutional amendment by which collegium system for appointment of judges in higher judiciary was scrapped and a new mechanism under National Judicial Appointment Commissi
item.itunes:summary: The Supreme Court will hear on Monday a batch of petitions challenging the 121st constitutional amendment by which collegium system for appointment of judges in higher judiciary was scrapped and a new mechanism under National Judicial Appointment Commission was proposed to be put in place

item.title: After release Irom supporters fear rearrest
item.description: Activists and Iroms family members say her release signify that the judiciary has finally accepted that her prolonged fast against the Armed Forces Special Powers Actnbspwas not an act of trying to commit suicide

item.title: Red green then saffron Its TMC versus BJP in West Bengal
item.description: Red doesnt fade into saffron But Trinamool Congress finds the impossible happening in her state hordes of CPIM workers even district level functionaries are joining the Parivar
item.itunes:subtitle: Red doesnt fade into saffron But Trinamool Congress finds the impossible happening in her state hordes of CPIM workers even district level functionaries are joining the Parivar
item.itunes:summary: Red doesnt fade into saffron But Trinamool Congress finds the impossible happening in her state hordes of CPIM workers even district level functionaries are joining the Parivar

item.title: Peaceful voting in assembly bypolls in 4 states
item.description: The Bharatiya Janata Party BJP is looking to extend its gain after the spectacular win in the Lok Sabha elections in the byelections being held in four states on Thursday
item.itunes:subtitle: The Bharatiya Janata Party BJP is looking to extend its gain after the spectacular win in the Lok Sabha elections in the byelections being held in four states on Thursday
item.itunes:summary: The Bharatiya Janata Party BJP is looking to extend its gain after the spectacular win in the Lok Sabha elections in the byelections being held in four states on Thursday
